steps.title: Add Life To Your Quotation
steps.content: This Button allows you to create a draft for new Quotation generated by requirement/need of Lead/Customer of Company.

steps.title: Items Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, shows below the list and information about Items required by Customer.

steps.title: Submit Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, submits the Corresponding Quotation and information about Items required by Customer.

steps.title: Edit Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, allows you to edit the current information about the Quotation so selected.

steps.title: Delete Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, deletes the corresponding Quotation from the records.
